meanings.definition: The tendency to split or divide into separate parts or groups.
meanings.sent1: The fissiparousnesses of the family led to constant arguments and disagreements.
meanings.sent2: The political party's fissiparousnesses resulted in the formation of multiple factions.
meanings.sent3: The fissiparousnesses of the puzzle pieces made it challenging to put them back together.
meanings.sent4: The fissiparousnesses of the community mirrored the cracks forming in the old bridge.
meanings.sent5: The fissiparousnesses of the organization made it difficult to maintain unity and focus.

meanings.definition: The state of being prone to division or fragmentation.
meanings.sent1: The company's fissiparousnesses were evident in the constant turnover of employees.
meanings.sent2: The region's fissiparousnesses made it challenging to establish a sense of community.
meanings.sent3: The fissiparousnesses of the jigsaw puzzle pieces made it hard to complete the picture.
meanings.sent4: The fissiparousnesses of the clouds in the sky hinted at an impending storm.
meanings.sent5: The fissiparousnesses of the rock formations created a stunning landscape of scattered boulders.
